description: As a Frontend Software Developer at Growild Technology Pty Ltd., I developed dynamic SPA plugins and game logic using modern web technologies like React, TypeScript, and Cocos Creator. I optimized development with Rollup, Gulp, and automated deployment via GitLab CI/CD and Jenkins. Additionally, I ensured code quality through comprehensive Jest testing while collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to develop HTML5 slot games.

As an Intern Full Stack Developer at Guimu Robot Co., Ltd., I utilized JPA for database operations with MySQL and employed third-party tools for data visualization. I implemented Spring AOP for efficient logging, deployed utilities on Docker with gRPC for microservices communication, re-engineered 20+ Restful APIs, and developed JUnit tests to ensure service reliability and functionality.
